item.title: Dhanashree Verma Breaks Silence Amid Divorce Rumours With Yuzvendra Chahal. Says: "I Choose To..." - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Dhanashree Verma Breaks Silence Amid Divorce Rumours With Yuzvendra Chahal. Says: "I Choose To..."

Published on: January 25, 2025 Source: NDTV

Dhanashree Verma, the wife of Indian cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal, has responded to rumors of divorce that have circulated online after Chahal reportedly removed photos of them together from his social media. Dhanashree has retained their pictures on her profile, prompting questions among fans about their relationship.

  • Dhanashree and Chahal got engaged in August 2020 and married in December 2020.
  • She expressed her disappointment over sensationalist reporting and the impact it has had on her family.
  • In her Instagram statement, she emphasized her strength and the importance of focusing on truth and positivity.
  • Chahal has also shared cryptic messages on Instagram that may relate to the rumors.
"I choose to focus on my truth and move forward, holding onto my values. The truth stands tall without the need for justification."

The couple's ongoing situation highlights the challenges of public life and the scrutiny celebrities face on social media.

item.title: New Zealand batting great retires from international cricket - ICC Cricket
item.description:
New Zealand Batting Star Martin Guptill Retires from International Cricket

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Sports News

Martin Guptill, a notable figure in New Zealand cricket, has announced his retirement from international cricket following an impressive career.

  • Guptill scored 7436 runs in 198 ODIs and 3531 runs in 122 T20Is.
  • He also participated in 47 Tests, accumulating 2586 runs.
  • Guptill played a crucial role in New Zealand's back-to-back ICC Men’s Cricket World Cup finals in 2015 and 2019.
  • In the 2015 World Cup, he was the top-scorer with 547 runs, achieving a double century against West Indies.
  • His score of 237 is the second-highest individual score in ODI history.
“He was an explosive player and instrumental in setting the tone for New Zealand’s batting line-up.”

Guptill's contributions to the game will be remembered, and his impact on New Zealand cricket is significant.

item.title: Dhanashree Verma breaks silence on divorce rumours with Yuzvendra Chahal, slams 'character assassination by trolls' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Dhanashree Verma breaks silence on divorce rumours with Yuzvendra Chahal, slams 'character assassination by trolls'

Date: Jan 08, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Dancer and reality show contestant Dhanashree Verma has publicly addressed rumors surrounding her separation from husband Yuzvendra Chahal, condemning online trolls and character attacks.

  • Dhanashree shared her statement on Instagram addressing the emotional toll of the rumors.
  • She criticized the lack of fact-checking and the negativity she has faced online.
  • The couple's marriage has faced scrutiny after they unfollowed each other on social media.
  • Despite the rumors, she emphasized her dedication to maintaining her integrity and values.
Dhanashree stated, "I choose to focus on my truth and move forward, holding onto my values. The truth stands tall without the need for justification."

This statement comes amidst increasing speculation about the couple's future, which they have largely chosen to remain silent about aside from cryptic posts.

item.title: Mohun Bagan, East Bengal derby shifted to Guwahati - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mohun Bagan, East Bengal derby shifted to Guwahati

Published on: Jan 08, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Kolkata derby between Mohun Bagan Super Giant and East Bengal has been relocated to Guwahati due to security concerns. This decision comes after the match was scheduled to take place at Salt Lake Stadium in Kolkata, but the police were unable to provide enough personnel for the event.

  • The derby is now set to occur on January 10 in Guwahati.
  • This is the second instance this season that the match could not be held at the designated venue because of police-related issues.
  • The necessary security for the match ranges between 1100 to 1400 police personnel, which could not be met.
  • Alternative venues considered included Jamshedpur and Delhi, but Guwahati was selected for logistical reasons with the ongoing AFC Challenge League schedule.
  • Mohun Bagan previously defeated East Bengal 2-0 in their first match of the season.
“Saturday blockbuster ‘Boro Match’ will now be played at Guwahati. See you, Mariners,” Mohun Bagan said on social media.

This venue shifting signals ongoing security challenges at significant sporting events in Kolkata, particularly for high-stakes matches like this derby.

item.title: West Ham SACK Julen Lopetegui after Man City & Liverpool thrashings with agreement in place for ex-Chelsea boss Graham Potter to take over relegation-threatened Hammers - Goal.com
item.description:
West Ham SACK Julen Lopetegui after Man City & Liverpool thrashings with agreement in place for ex-Chelsea boss Graham Potter to take over relegation-threatened Hammers

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Goal.com

West Ham United has parted ways with manager Julen Lopetegui following heavy defeats to Manchester City and Liverpool, with a deal in place for Graham Potter to replace him as the club seeks to avoid relegation.

  • West Ham faced disappointing results in recent matches against top teams.
  • Lopetegui was unable to improve the team's performance despite hopes for a turnaround.
  • Graham Potter, a former Chelsea manager, is reportedly being lined up for the managerial role.
  • The club is under pressure to avoid dropping out of the Premier League.
"The results were not acceptable, and we had to make a difficult decision for the future of the club." - Club statement

This managerial change reflects West Ham's urgent need to turn their season around as they aim for better performance and results.

item.title: Sources: Amad agrees new Man United contract - ESPN India
item.description:
Amad Diallo Signs New Long-Term Contract with Manchester United

Date: Jan 8, 2025 | Source: ESPN

Manchester United have finalized a new long-term contract for Amad Diallo, securing his future at Old Trafford as a vital player under head coach Ruben Amorim.

  • Amad Diallo, 22, has agreed to extend his contract which was due to expire this season.
  • He has scored six goals in 28 appearances this season, becoming a key contributor for Manchester United.
  • The club chose to negotiate a new deal instead of exercising a 12-month extension option.
  • Diallo arrived from Atalanta in 2020 for £37 million and has had successful loan spells at Rangers and Sunderland.
  • He tallied 14 goals in 42 games during his loan at Sunderland, earning significant accolades.
“He won both Sunderland's young player of the year award and the PFA Championship fans' player of the year award.”

Amad has been instrumental in recent matches, including a last-minute winning goal against Manchester City.

item.title: Three Man Utd players they're desperate to axe as major January transfer issue exposed - The Mirror
item.description:
Three Man Utd players they're desperate to axe as major January issue exposed

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mirror

Manchester United is aiming for a major squad overhaul as Sir Jim Ratcliffe seeks to offload high-earning players to reduce costs.

  • Manchester United is open to offers for nearly all players as they work on reducing their wage bill.
  • Key players targeted for offloading include Marcus Rashford, Casemiro, and Antony.
  • United plans to comply with profit and sustainability rules by eliminating £1 million a week from wages.
  • Young talents such as Kobbie Mainoo and Alejandro Garnacho are also speculated to be on the market.
  • The ramifications of poor performance this season create challenges in attracting buyers for underperforming players.
“United have made shifting three players a priority – striker Marcus Rashford, midfielder Casemiro, and winger Antony.”

In conclusion, Manchester United's 'everything must go' strategy reflects a deep reassessment of its squad and financial strategy as they aim to improve performance and comply with regulations.

item.title: Meet Sania Mirza's sister, who divorced her first husband then married a star cricketer's son, her net worth is Rs... - India.com
item.description:
Meet Sania Mirza's Sister Anam Mirza: A Journey Through Divorce, Marriage to a Cricketer's Son, and Impressive Net Worth

Publication Date: Not specified, Source: India.com

Anam Mirza, sister of Indian tennis star Sania Mirza, has made headlines with her unique life journey, including a divorce and subsequent marriage to a prominent cricketer's son.

  • Anam was previously married to Akbar Rasheed in 2016 but they divorced in 2018.
  • In 2019, she married Mohammad Asaduddin, son of former Indian cricket captain Mohammad Azharuddin.
  • She holds a degree in Mass Communication and started her career in journalism before founding her own company.
  • Anam's net worth is estimated to be around Rs 331 crore ($40 million), thanks to her ventures and YouTube channel.
Anam Mirza's entrepreneurial journey includes founding 'The Label Bazaar' and co-founding Daawat-e-Ramzan.

In conclusion, Anam Mirza's story reflects resilience and success in her personal and professional life.

item.title: Shakib bowling action saga: BCB wait on results from Chennai before CT 2025 decision - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Shakib Al Hasan Awaits Bowling Action Test Results Amid Selection Uncertainties

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Shakib Al Hasan is currently awaiting the results of a second bowling action test from Chennai, India, after being suspended from bowling in international cricket due to a failed assessment from UK's Loughborough University.

  • Shakib was reported for a suspect bowling action during a county match in September.
  • The Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) is delaying the announcement of the Champions Trophy squad pending the test results.
  • BCB President Faruque Ahmed supports Shakib's return to the national team.
  • Shakib has been out of international play since his last Tests in India due to socio-political issues and is under assessment due to his bowling action.
“It was very shocking to hear that Shakib couldn't pass the bowling action test [at Loughborough],” said BCB chief selector Gazi Ashraf Hossain.

Shakib’s performance and health remain a topic of conversation as he seeks to correct his bowling action with guidance from coaches, aiming for a swift return to the field.

item.title: 'Call Ajit Agarkar And Give A Strict Message': Former BCCI Official Asks New Secretary - News18
item.description:
Former BCCI Official Urges New Secretary to Send Strong Message to Ajit Agarkar

Date: January 08, 2025 | Source: News18

A former Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) official has called on incoming secretary Devajit Saikia to send a ‘strict message’ to Ajit Agarkar after India's disappointing performance in the 2024-25 Border-Gavaskar Trophy.

  • The official insists that the BCCI needs to be more authoritative in managing cricket in India.
  • He emphasized the importance of enforcing discipline among players, stating no player should consider themselves bigger than the game.
  • Senior players like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli have faced heavy criticism for their poor performances.
“The message is going very bad. No player should consider himself bigger than the game.”

Despite criticism, the Indian team will focus on white-ball cricket and the IPL before heading to England for a series of five Tests.

item.title: Virat Kohli exactly knows how to get through form slump: Faf du Plessis - The Times of India
item.description:
Virat Kohli exactly knows how to get through form slump: Faf du Plessis

Publication Date: N/A | Source: N/A

Faf du Plessis praises Virat Kohli's ability to handle pressure during a form slump, emphasizing his mental strength and experience.

  • Kohli's approach to overcoming challenges during a poor form is highlighted.
  • Du Plessis notes Kohli's resilience and track record in the sport.
  • The discussion addresses how mental fortitude is crucial for athletes in competitive environments.
“Virat has always shown how to bounce back from tough phases in his career.”

This insight into Kohli’s mindset reveals the key characteristics that separate elite athletes from their peers.

item.title: Martin Guptill confirms retirement from international cricket - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Martin Guptill Announces Retirement from International Cricket

Date: January 11, 2024 | Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Martin Guptill has confirmed his retirement from international cricket, marking the end of an illustrious career with New Zealand. He will continue playing in domestic T20 leagues.

  • Guptill played his last international match in October 2022.
  • He features among New Zealand's highest run-scorers in ODIs and T20Is.
  • Guptill scored 7346 runs in 198 ODIs, trailing only Ross Taylor and Stephen Fleming.
  • His T20I records include 3531 runs in 122 matches, making him the leading run-scorer for New Zealand in that format.
  • Highlights of his career include a double century in the 2015 ODI World Cup and a vital role in New Zealand's path to two consecutive World Cup finals.
  • Guptill has also played several T20 leagues around the world since giving up his central contract.
“As a young kid it was always my dream to play for New Zealand and I feel incredibly lucky and proud to have played 367 games for my country,” Guptill expressed in his farewell statement.

The cricket community is set to acknowledge his contributions during the third ODI against Sri Lanka on January 11, 2024.

item.title: Nepomniachtchi In Semifinals After Niemann Blunders Mate-In-1 - Chess.com
item.description:
Nepomniachtchi Advances to Semifinals After Niemann's Mistake

Publication Date: January 7, 2025

Source: Chess.com

In a thrilling matchup at the 2025 Weissenhaus Freestyle Chess Grand Slam, Ian Nepomniachtchi secured his place in the semifinals after Hans Niemann blundered a mate-in-one during the blitz playoff.

  • Niemann initially defeated Maxime Vachier-Lagrave and faced Nepomniachtchi in the quarterfinals.
  • The semifinals will feature Nepomniachtchi against Vladimir Fedoseev, and Javokhir Sindarov against Yu Yangyi.
  • The semifinals and final are set for January 8, 2025, starting at 11:00 ET.

“At least I found my mate-in-one, so probably my endless training in Puzzle Rush paid off!” — Ian Nepomniachtchi

The knockout tournament showcased intense matches with several high-profile players. Amid standout performances, Nepomniachtchi's journey continued as he seeks to claim the grand prize.

item.title: Star India cricketer Parthiv Patel had fallen in love with his childhood friend, impressed her by... - India.com
item.description:
Star India cricketer Parthiv Patel had fallen in love with his childhood friend, impressed her by...

Date: [Date not provided]

Source: India.com

In this series of images, we will explore the romantic journey of India's cricket star Parthiv Patel, who found love with his childhood companion.

  • Parthiv Patel's love story began with a long drive.
  • He took his friend Avni Zaveri on a long drive to impress her.
  • Parthiv and Avni were both scared to confess their feelings to each other.
  • Parthiv proposed to Avni with flowers in a surprising manner.
“Parthiv wanted to tell Avni his feelings, and he did so with a proposal.”

This love story highlights the sweet and romantic moments between childhood friends who grow to love each other.

item.title: Star India Batter Opts Out Of Elite BCCI Event After Australia Test Series Loss. Reason Is... - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Star India Batter Skips BCCI Event Following Australia Test Series

Publication Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Indian cricketer KL Rahul has opted out of the Vijay Hazare Trophy knockout matches after a demanding series against Australia. This decision raises questions about the availability of top players for domestic tournaments.

  • KL Rahul requested a break after participating in all five Test matches against Australia.
  • Other players like Prasidh Krishna, Devdutt Padikkal, and Washington Sundar will be available for the Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • Rahul's participation in the second phase of the Ranji Trophy will be decided later.
  • Prasidh Krishna performed well in the fifth Test at Sydney, taking six wickets.
  • Devdutt Padikkal played just one Test in Perth, scoring a zero and a 25.
“I hope to see frontline players available for the Ranji Trophy,” said India head coach Gautam Gambhir.

This decision reflects the balance players are trying to maintain between domestic commitments and international performance.

item.title: Pakistan stadiums incomplete, preparations for Champions Trophy 2025 in jeopardy; PCB dismisses concerns - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pakistan Stadium Preparations for 2025 Champions Trophy in Trouble

Date: Jan 08, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The preparation of the three host stadiums in Pakistan for the ICC Champions Trophy is in jeopardy due to ongoing construction delays, just five weeks before the event.

  • The PCB is behind schedule on the renovation of National Stadium in Karachi, Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore, and Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium.
  • Developers face challenges with incomplete seating, floodlights, facilities, and playing surfaces.
  • Concerns from the ICC have led to potential taskforce interventions for status checks.
  • The PCB intends to complete the work by the January 25 deadline, as announced in their press release.
  • Upcoming matches in a tri-nation series are planned to aid the preparations.
“The PCB is fully committed to ensuring that all venues are ready to host the ICC Champions Trophy 2025.”

In conclusion, while there are significant concerns regarding the timely completion of the renovations, the PCB remains optimistic about meeting deadlines and improving the fan experience for the upcoming tournament.

item.title: The curious case of Abhimanyu Easwaran: A perpetual wait for maiden India cap - The Times of India
item.description:
The curious case of Abhimanyu Easwaran: A perpetual wait for maiden India cap

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: Unspecified

Abhimanyu Easwaran, a talented cricketer, continues to await his maiden call-up to the Indian national team despite impressive domestic performances.

  • Easwaran's consistent performance in domestic leagues makes him a strong candidate for the national team.
  • Despite his accolades, he remains without an international cap.
  • Fans and analysts are debating the reasons for his prolonged absence from the squad.
“His time will come; his performances cannot be overlooked for long.”

The cricketing community remains hopeful that Easwaran’s efforts will soon be recognized, granting him the chance he has long awaited.
